website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically with businesses in mind, allowing owners to issue 1099s and W-2s as well as file their business taxes.
pros: For small enterprises including multi-member LLCs, S or C corporations with fewer than 5 employees
Intuit’s live phone support is invaluable for time-strapped owners
cons: Install is glitchy on PCs without Windows 10

website_summaries.verdict: For multi-owner small businesses or partnerships, this software fits the bill. Initial installation can be a pain point.
pros: Unlimited creation of W-2 and 1099 forms
Documents for partners, employees, contractors and shareholders
cons: Software often seen as malware by Windows 8, requiring a workaround to install
No home or personal version included.Can not transfer data from Quickbooks Online

customer_reviews.title: All the help you need to do it yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to complete the returns for my dad's trust for which I'm the trustee. I've had my accountant do it for six years. This year, I decided to tackle it myself. I learned a lot and actually enjoyed completing this process. The step-by-step questions take you where you need to go. I feel confident that I did it correctly. Next year I'll be even more efficient at completing these returns. If you're smart, detail-oriented, and have the time, you can certainly take charge of doing your own taxes with this product.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: This Product is a Bundle of Tax Returns
customer_reviews.text: Overall, does what I need to have done. However... All I want it for is the TRUST tax return feature. Thus, I feel that I'm overpaying for what I need. In the same breath, I realize why TT bundles - there's probably not enuf demand for a product of "Trust Only" tax returns.
customer_reviews.author: Chesterfield

customer_reviews.title: Must Enter Activation Code
customer_reviews.text: I have used TurboTax for years and always managed to get a simple trust tax return finished with TT Business. There are a few items that are not explained and it takes a while to research if you are very familiar with the tax code. For 2019 TurboTax requires an activation code (good for five machines). Just one more hoop TT requires - if you don't register your product you get a nag screen every time you start the program.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Is not calculating QBI!!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like you're done and you pass the error check but your Qualified Business Income deduction is not calculating. If you qualify for this deduction wait for the update. Very disappointed that there is no notice in TT that you are missing forms required for the deduction.
customer_reviews.author: longh20

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult and does not include state
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY difficult to use. This is my second year. I have a business and need to generate a K1 for my shareholders. It is a lot of work and is nothing like the other Home versions. It is the only game in town. It is way more than I need. I also needs to buy the home version for personal taxes. I wish there was a simple home version for small s-corps. That does the k1 and files your personal taxes as well. When all is said and done it costs me 250 in turbo tax software.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Not Useful for Trust Tax Filing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trust I inherited last year. Plugged in all the information and it said I owed $7K! I doubled-checked my work and I know I added the information correctly. Fortunately, I was able to find a local CPA who specializes in Trusts and Estates and after she plugged in all the same info in her software, I only ended up owing just $306! That's a huge difference. Her fee was less than what I owed, but she saved me almost $7,000! Next year, just going to pay her and save the $120 from not ever buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: jpseagull

customer_reviews.title: Good way to LEARN how to do your own taxes
customer_reviews.text: Works for my LLC, tells you the QBI amount when you get to that section...I feel confident that all my numbers are where they should be but IF this is your first time using buisness turbo tax it may take a while to make sure you answer ALL the questions correctly which on a few you will have to do some research on turbo tax questions and answers community but feel assure that any questions you have, have already been asked and answer by others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good ole standard TT for Business
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years to prepare our LLC farm's business taxes. This program remains easy to use for me. There are parts that I do not understand, as a non-accountant, but help is available. The IRS's instructions, as always, are a joke. I doubt that an accountant could understand them, so don't look for help there. This program will serve for simple businesses, whether LLC or LLP or company.
customer_reviews.author: Iatros

customer_reviews.title: Great software and a must if you're doing your own taxes
customer_reviews.text: I have used the TurboTax business software for many years now. I feel confident in my returns and I have never had a problem. This is a great product to help me get all the deductions that I am eligible for and also make sure that everything is done correctly. Now I buy this and use it every year. I save a lot of money doing my own taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Started with Turbo Tax Can't Understand how to Transfer to Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several times to switch to another software, but I don't understand Depreciation enough to switch, and I spent hours trying to figure it out, but it is confusing, so I re-purchased Turbo-tax for several years. It works and I can follow the procedure, but it is a more expensive option than others and I wish I would have started with another software.
customer_reviews.author: Teri577

customer_reviews.title: NO support for this product at Turbo Tax! NONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my business taxes last year and thought maybe I was just not understanding the new tax laws. BUT, this year, I understand them and this software is miscalculating things! I called Turbo Tax about it and was told that "there really isn't any support for the Business product other than navigation"... Buy at your own risk! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: DDay

customer_reviews.title: Needs help from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: After working several hours on the phone with TurboTax specialist it was determined that this software will not run on my Windows 10 system. It’s taken us this long to attempt to try to make it work so I still feel you should allow me to return it for full credit. Who do I contact about this?
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work with Microsoft 10 and AMD processor
customer_reviews.text: After one hour on the phone I was finally told by tech support that Intuit has changed the software and it no longer works with AMD processors. You must have an Intel processor. It will not import data from last year's Turbotax return or any of the previous 5 year's data. It always did in the past.
customer_reviews.author: hdfxrs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent software
customer_reviews.text: I always use Turbo Tax software, it's great. They don't have all the forms from the IRS yet. I'm waiting for depreciation forms.
customer_reviews.author: John M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nobody likes doing their taxes but turbo tax saves me money over having a tax professional doing them. I have been using this software for 5 years now and if i encounter a problem, their support help always gets me through it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Returned and they only paid back $8
customer_reviews.text: Returned and they only paid back $8 - Decided to go with an accountant. Paid over a hundred dollars for this and they did not refund the total. Sold by "Amazon Smart Home Services".
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: It finally works so you can E-file
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the update to allow. E÷filing. Cost too much to have to wait so long for a fix. Will probably try a different program next year as no offer of a partial refund was offered.
customer_reviews.author: P. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Works for small trust account but no brokerage download.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a much better product if you could download the brokerage firm 1099 instead of entering all the data manually. This is a long time complaint about this product.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan dahm

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use QuickBooks for my business. I tried multiple times to upload my information and every time I did the results were incorrect. I physically had to re-enter all information and it is still wrong. Buy H&R Block
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS TO PREPARE 1040-NR AND JUST TODAY, THEY INFORMED ME THAT TURBOTAX DOES NOT SUPPORT 1040-NR. I DO NOT NEED IT FOR ANYTHING ELSE. IT WAS A FAVOR I WAS GOING TO DO FOR SOME FAMILIY LIVING ABROAD AND HAS A LLC HERE. I CAN GIVE YOU ANSWERS I RECEIVED FROM TURBOTAX. THEY SENT ME TO SPRINTAX AND THEY HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS. I AM A RETIRED PERSON TRYING TO HELP SOMEBODY ABROAD....
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Chueca

customer_reviews.title: As always the best of bad choices
customer_reviews.text: Once again more fluff and the irritating startup checking for updates. But no obvious errors and after all of these years a stable product.
customer_reviews.author: ALF Engineer

customer_reviews.title: amazon has best price
customer_reviews.text: you cannot beat amazon on price, all the stores, are still higher, even Costco and Sams, I have used for years, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Requires multiple activations.
customer_reviews.text: This program's activation system is broken. It will require you to activate the program nearly every time you open the program. You have only 5 activations. You will use them up and then cannot open the program to access your tax return. If you do a web search you will find that this is common.
customer_reviews.author: Confused

customer_reviews.title: G00d tax preparation software
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It is intuitive, accurate and relatively easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Love turbo tax.  Saved $1500
customer_reviews.text: I use this for three of my companies and it is a pleasure to use. I am not an accountant and sometimes I don’t really understand the questions. But the help screens are very useful and by going back from the step to step or forms entry mode helps a lot
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W.

customer_reviews.title: Illegal
customer_reviews.text: It took me months to discover the issues with the tax program. Intuit finally informed me I was sent and illegal copy and that the program issues were due to that fact. Vendor never replied to earlier concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: GETS WORSE EVERY YEAR
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR THOSE WHO DON'T HAVE SOME KIND OF TAX BACKGROUND.
customer_reviews.author: NICER THAN NICE

customer_reviews.title: The only tax software for me
customer_reviews.text: Used to be easier to find subjects to go to within interview--not so easy now. But there's always the forms feature.
customer_reviews.author: Arja

customer_reviews.title: Trusted for years
customer_reviews.text: Have used for years, never a worry with this software.
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Business Tax Program
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey - charge separately for state tax forms - not clear on which product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Tom

customer_reviews.title: TTAX Business is just okay
customer_reviews.text: TTax business leaves a lot to be desired, but I would be lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: turbo tax discs corrupted
customer_reviews.text: The firs business addition was corrupted according to turbo tax. I ordered another but cancelled the order. Cost me $30.00 to cancel and send back. Also bought Premier, Also corrupted according to turbotax. Probably will cost me $20.00 to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This product can not be used. The activation code did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tomkavits

customer_reviews.title: Easiest, Fastest, Most Reliable
customer_reviews.text: TurboTax is the only software I use for my taxes and other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Romsey

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Error messages, and no ability to e-file.
customer_reviews.text: After completing my entire coproate return, I get a message when I click "e-file" stating that it is too early to file, that tax season hasn't started yet. It's January 30th !!! Bunk. Garbage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and intuitive
customer_reviews.text: I have used this software for many years and it is very easy to use even if you are not a CPA.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great software for doing small business taxes.
customer_reviews.text: I like having previous years comparison, which make it easier to review and not miss something important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product delivers
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and I have confidence in the results
customer_reviews.author: R A Lamb Author

customer_reviews.title: Downloading
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two programs and neither would download properly. I finally had an it person download it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: nEED BETTER STATE DOWNLOAD
customer_reviews.text: THE FEDERAL PROGRAM IS GREAT, BUT DOWNLOADING STATE CORP (COLORADO) FROZE THE COMPUTER. hAD TO TURN COMPUTER OFF AND ON TO CONTINUE PROCESSING RETURN. tHIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED!
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Worst start up I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Unable to install with disc and had to download. Many tries at updating. After many hours was updated.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Filed taxes for my family trust now for 3 years and never had any issues or problems
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used turbo tax for over 10 years in Business and Personal taxes what a life saver for me so far so good !
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: CD would not install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the CD for this program and TurboTax Deluxe.. TurboTax Deluxe installed from the CD. This program would not. Had to get the program on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Save in two places
customer_reviews.text: After one update the software lost all the data I had entered, that is bad!
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Works but Please an online or Mac Version
customer_reviews.text: Always works great. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE make a version for Mac
customer_reviews.author: Paul Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Made filing a tax return for an Estate easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy and affordable way of filing income tax return for an Estate.
customer_reviews.author: Arron C Guenzi

customer_reviews.title: cd downloads
customer_reviews.text: so far no problems but State down load more expensive
customer_reviews.author: clearchoice

product_meta.title: TurboTax Business 2019 Tax Software [PC Disc]
product_meta.description: TurboTax Business is recommended if your small business is a partnership, S Corp, C Corp, multi-member LLC, or for trusts and estates. TurboTax is tailored to your unique situation-it will search for the business deductions and credits you deserve • TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and double checks your return as you go to handle even the toughest tax situations, so you can be confident you're getting every dollar you deserve. • Every year it gets even easier. As a returning customer, TurboTax will automatically transfer last year's data to help ensure accuracy and save you time • Up-to-date with the latest tax laws-so you can be confident your taxes will be done right. • Help along the way-get answers to your product questions, so you won't get stuck. • Your information is safeguarded - TurboTax uses encryption technology, so your tax data is protected while it's e-filed to IRS and state agencies
feature_bullets: TurboTax Business works best if your small business is a partnership, S Corp, C Corp, multi-member LLC, or for trusts and estates
Prepare and file your business or trust taxes with confidence
Get guidance in reporting income and expenses
Boost your bottom line with industry specific tax deductions
Create W 2 and 1099 tax forms for employees and contractors
Includes 5 free federal e-files, state preparation additional. Windows only
Save time with streamlined asset depreciation and reporting as well as importing prior year tax data
Free U.S. based TurboTax product support via phone
Easily import your data from QuickBooks Desktop products

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
